attrs.description:
Elevate privileges for Scrutiny.</br>
This is only needed for **SOME** NVMe drives.</br>
Enabling this option, Scrutiny will get SYS_ADMIN capability.</br>
This is a security risk, in case the application is compromised.</br>
Use at your own risk.
